item.title: [模板][数据结构] 树状数组 Binary Index Tree/Fenwick Tree
item.description: 树状数组 Binary Index Tree/Fenwick Tree 1d 单点修改，区间询问 // id 0~n-1 template<typename T,size_t M,typename OpPlus=plus<T>,typename OpMinus=minus<T>> struct BIT { static int lowbit(int x) { return x&(-x); } T tree[M+1]; // tree[i] -> sum of [i-lowbit(i)+1,i] T tmp[M+1]; OpPlus opp; OpMinus opm; int n; void init(int n_) { n=n_; for(int i=1;i<=n;i++) tree[i]=T(0); } void init(int n_,T v[]) { n=n_; tmp[0]=T(0); for(int i=0;i<n;i++) tmp[i+1]=opp(tmp[i],v[i]); for(int i=1;i<=n;i++) tree[i]=opm(tmp[i],tmp[i-lowbit(i)]); // for(int i=0;i<n;i++) add(i,v[i]); } void add(int p,T V) { for(p=p+1;p<=n;p+=lowbit(p)) tree[p]=opp(tree[p],V); } T sum(int p) { T ans(0); for(p=p+1;p;p-=lowbit(p)) ans=opp(ans,tree[p]); return ans; } T
